The blazingly fast framework for the web.

Run the following to setup cheetah:

deno run -Ar https://deno.land/x/cheetah/setup.ts

üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Schema Validation

When building a large API with cheetah, you probably want some sort of validation to reduce the amount of boilerplate code to validate the body, query, cookies, and header of the incoming request.

import cheetah from 'https://deno.land/x/cheetah/mod.ts'
import z from 'https://deno.land/x/zod/mod.ts'

const app = new cheetah()

app.post('/', {
  body: z.object({
    email: z.string().email(),
    password: z.string()
  })
}, () => 'Hello!')

ü™ñ Secure

cheetah ensures that parsing doesn't cause your app to freeze.

import cheetah from 'https://deno.land/x/cheetah/mod.ts'

const app = new cheetah()

app.post('/', (c) => {
  const body = await c.req.buffer()
})

ü™π Chaining & Nesting

cheetah doesn't dictate you how to write your app.

import cheetah from 'https://deno.land/x/cheetah/mod.ts'

const app = new cheetah()
  .get('/cake', () => 'üéÇ') // GET '/cake'
  .patch('/cookie', () => 'üç™') // PATCH '/cookie'
  .put('/donut', () => 'üç©') // PUT '/donut'

import cheetah, { Collection } from 'https://deno.land/x/cheetah/mod.ts'

const fastFood = new Collection()
  .get('/burger', () => 'üçî') // GET '/fast-food/burger'

const app = new cheetah()
  .use('/fast-food', fastFood)
  .patch('/pancakes', () => 'ü•û') // PATCH '/pancakes'
